meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>flat</kanji> <kanji>peace</kanji>. This is a peace that will last, because there's no waves... no ripples... just flat. This is plain old <vocabulary>peace</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
